lead_paragraph: MIRANDA--Joseph C.,Esq., of Manhasset, NY, passed on June 10, 2016 at age 86. Beloved husband for 61 years of Joan, father of Neal and Gail, father-in-law of Robert and grandfather of Lindsay, Adam, Melanie and Jackson. Proud alumni of Regis High School, Fordham University and Fordham Law. He will be sorely missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MIRANDA, JOSEPH C.
